title: After i press "launch" for the new update.
body: After i Press "Launch"  when the newest update client has been installed, the only thing that happens is the window for league of legends disappears and... well that's it. nothing else happens. its like i press the close out button or something. has anyone had this happen and if so how do you fix it?

replies.body: Give your computer a reboot just in case anything crashed in the background.  Should it persist, your settings may have changed and blocking the patcher from launching.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is added as an exception.
Okay. I followed the guide and reinstalled it as administrator and its working now. Thank you for your help.
Great to hear, thanks for letting us know!
Okay and thank you for the fast response. I'm  going to follow the Permissions Guide. I will post if it works and if it doesn't letting you know in case further help is needed.
